entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 5:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.5°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
